vote.text: Amendment SA 697 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 697 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Lautenberg. (consideration: CR S3736; text: CR S3736) To amend the resolving clause.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 697 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Lautenberg.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 697 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
